      • anyToBooleanOrElse

        public static Boolean anyToBooleanOrElse(Object any,
                                         Boolean orElse)
        If it is not a boolean, then if it is a string, anything that is not "true" or "True" is false, if it is a number, then anything that is not 0.0 is true.

        orElse - default value

      • newURL

        public static URL newURL(String str)
        Create a URL from the String. If the String does not have a protocol/scheme, file:// is assumed and prepended.
        Parameters:
        str - the string representation
        Returns:
        the URL

      • newURL

        public static URL newURL(URL dirURL,
                         String fileName)
        Equivalent of creating a new file from a directory file and name string. This tries to roughly provide the equivalent of "new File(dirFile, nameString)" for a URL and a name String. The catch is that in order for this to work, the given dir URL must end in a slash. This method assumes that the first URL always refers to a directory and therefore appends a slash if necessary.

        Note: if the dirURL contains a query and/or a fragment, those parts are lost in the resulting URL.

        Parameters:
        dirURL - directory URL
        fileName - file name
        Returns:
        the URL

      • getName

        public static String getName(URL url)
        Return the last path component of a hierarchical path of URL.
        Parameters:
        url - the URL
        Returns:
        the string representation of the last path component

      • getParentURL

        public static URL getParentURL(URL url)
        Return the parent path for a URL. This is the path, with the last component of the path removed, i.e. with that part removed that is returned by the getName() method.
        Parameters:
        url - the url
        Returns:
        parent path url

      • getParent

        public static String getParent(URL url)
        Return the parent path for a URL. This is the path, with the last component of the path removed, i.e. with that part removed that is returned by the getName() method.
        Parameters:
        url - the url
        Returns:
        the parent path

      • exists

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true if can be opened

      • isFile

        public static boolean isFile(URL url)
        Return truen if the URL is a file URL.
        Parameters:
        url - the url
        Returns:
        true if a file

      • newURLOld

        public static URL newURLOld(URL dirURL,
                            String fileName)
        Return URL for the file inside the dir URL. This makes sure that the dirURL ends with a slash before creating the final URL, since the constructor new URL(url1, "file") will remove the last part of the path of url1 if it does not end in a slash.
        Parameters:
        dirURL - URL
        fileName - filename
        Returns:
        url
